item.title: Icheon, South Korea - Flying freely in the autumn sky, Icheon hot air balloon free flight
item.description:
Hot Air Balloon <Photo courtesy of Korea Organization Association>

Flying freely in the autumn sky, Icheon hot air balloon free flight

Icheon, South Korea

As a child, I imagined flying freely in a big balloon like a heroine in a fairy tale. The desire to fly in the sky as an adult remains the same. It's exciting to imagine that you're flying in the wind with a hot air balloon instead of an airplane. The place to make that dream come true is Seokyung-ri village in Icheon, Gyeonggi-do. From this place, it floats up to the sky and flies around the Icheon plain, where the autumn light has fallen.
Flying dreams
A balloon flying in the air with a basket in a large balloon-shaped pocket. There are three major organizations we know. There is a hot air balloon that heats the air with fire and rises to the sky, a gas balloon that fills a balloon with hydrogen or helium, and a rosiere method that is a mixture of a hot air balloon and a gas balloon. It is often the gas balloon that comes only 20-30 meters into the sky after the balloon is tied down at the event or tourist spot.
Hot air balloon
The equipment you can experience in Icheon Seogyeong-ri is a hot air balloon that warms air with fire and floats in the sky, allowing you to fly freely in the direction of the wind. It's not just an experience, but a 'flying' flying over the Icheon Plains in a hot air balloon. Rest assured that pilots who are certified by the Korea Organization Association will read and control the wind flow.
It's so big that people can fit inside the balloon.
Hot air balloons move along the wind. So they fly between two to three hours after the most stable sun rises. Because of the early morning flight, the Korea Association of Associations operates a one-night and two-day program. In the afternoon of the day before the flight, stay in the village of Seogyeongsul, and prepare to take off after seeing the weather condition around 7 o'clock around dawn.
Spread the hot air balloon on the ground before taking off
Head to the park next to Seogyeong Reservoir, a dusky dawn take-off. Envelopes, big balloons that let you fly into the sky, are placed on the floor and filled with blown air with a large fan. It's so big that I want to swell it in a circle, but in 15 minutes it's a balloon. When the goofy is filled to some extent, it burns the air with a burner to heat the air. It floats like a balloon in an instant.
Fill the air to inflate the balloon
The principle of a hot air balloon is very simple. Heating the air in the airbag lowers the density of the air in the bag and rises to the sky.
Heat the air and hot air balloon comes to mind
It's just a blue sky when you look up, and the wind flows differently depending on the altitude. The pilot checks the direction of the wind along the altitude, fires and stops, and changes the altitude to adjust the balloon.
Heat the air and hot air balloon comes to mind
Ride on a basket-like gondola with a snack to eat and water. Goofy shakes softly in the wind, so the gondola shakes. When the pilot fires the fire for a long time, the instrument quickly comes to mind. It is more stable than when it comes to land. In a moment, the Seogyeong Reservoir is placed under your feet and the ground crew unwinds the ropes that hold the balloon and the flight begins.
Burner to warm air from hot air balloon
Having experienced paragliding and bungee jumping, even those who are looking at the scenery from the sky will experience a different experience when they ride a hot air balloon. The feeling of flying in the air without wearing equipment on the body can not be expressed in words. It feels like you're walking in the sky because you can float and walk around in a basket.
Pilots operate instruments in the direction of the wind
Morning on the sky
I was worried that it would be cold in the early morning sky, but it wasn't cold because the fire pillars rose above my head and the Onggi boiled in the basket. The village under the feet is busy starting the day, and the hot air balloon slowly swims over other worlds. Icheon is surrounded by mountains around Bing, so the wind is stable and it is the only plain in Gyeonggi-do.
Icheon plain from the mechanism
The wide plains, rural villages, and wild mountains make the city look so dense when viewed from the sky. Looking down from the sky, the compartments are divided and the yellow fields are like pie slices and the house is like a toy block. I wonder what the white snowy plains are like.
Icheon plain from the mechanism
As you fly early in the morning, you can see how the fog slowly settles far below the horizon. On clear days, you can see the sun rising from the horizon. It is only possible to travel on a hot air balloon while swimming in the sky in the autumn hot air balloon, and when Kim residents gather for Kim Jang-chul, they can sit down and get one Kimchi Kimchi.
Looking down from the sky, the world is like a toy village.
Hot air ballooning flies around two thousand for an hour. Every day, depending on the wind, they fly on an average of 20km to land on the Namhan River, the Anseong River basin, or land on harvested rice fields. Most of them land on rice fields, so free flight is only possible from October to March after the harvest is over. When he flew the farthest, he even went to Chungju. As hot air balloons fly freely, ground agents will follow you from below, so don't worry about going home.
Looking down from the sky, the world is like a toy village.
Seogyeongdl Experience Village
In addition to free flight flying by wind, you can experience mooring flight by connecting the land and hot air balloon, and climbing up to 10 ~ 20m above the ground. The mooring flight is mainly made up of student groups who come to Seogyeongdeul Village for experiential learning. It is the most exciting and exciting moment for children. Children's laughter, like colorful leaves, floats in the autumn sky with a hot air balloon.
Hot Air Balloons at Night
Seo Kyung-ri, a take-off place for hot air balloons, is a village where you can experience various farming experiences, such as making hand tofu, soaking intestines, and catching loach. It is a good opportunity to make a deep memory with hot air balloon experience.
Hot Air Balloons at Night
Let's leave to enjoy the season that is getting shorter in the middle of autumn when the colorful peak is the peak of autumn.
Hot Air Balloons at Night
Travel info

Seogyeongdeul Village
-Address: 75, Jinsangmi-ro 1163beon-gil, Icheon-si, Gyeonggi-do
Contact: 031-634-1089

www.seogyeong.kr

Korea Organization Association
Inquiries: 02-711-8439
www.koreaballoon.org

Restaurants near

-Willow House: Saeng sirloin, Bongalbi / 2178, Gyeongchung-daero, Bubal-eup, Icheon-si, Gyeonggi-do / 031-631-5757
-Seogyeongdeul Tofu: Tofu cuisine / 17, Jinsangmi-ro 1178beon-gil, Moga-myeon, Icheon-si, Gyeonggi-do / 031-633-1701

Rooms
-West Gyeongdle: 1163 Jinsangmi-ro, Moga-myeon, Icheon, Gyeonggi-do / 031-631-1870
-Termeden: Moro-myeon, Moga-myeon, Icheon, Gyeonggi-do 988 / 031-645-2000

http://www.termeden.com/

item.title: Icheon, South Korea - I live with rice! Restoration in a bowl of “King's King Icheon Rice”
item.description:
Glutinous Icheon stone rice with rice

I live with rice! Restoration in a bowl of “King's King Icheon Rice”

Icheon, South Korea

Passing through Chobok and entering the center of the heat, now is the season when you need to take care of yourself. At this time, we use summer chicken with eel or chicken. Based on the style of Lee Yeol-chi-yeol introduced earlier, cool cold noodles, plural nights, and red bean shaved ice are added as summer delicacies. It's a hot season full of various styles of food, but no matter what anyone says, Koreans live with 'bapsim'. So prepared. From the old days, the rice paddy town that has caught on to the king's appetite.
Our Korean food divided into stocks and corrosion. Most Asian regions, including South Korea and neighboring China and Japan, are rice cultures that are cooked with rice and side dishes. In Western cultures where bread is eaten, wheat is replaced by rice. We need water to build our staple rice crop. This is why 'irrigation' is needed to water farmland. This required a large number of labor forces and farmers gathered around the waterways to induce community life. This characteristic of the Asian region, which shows cooperation and interdependence, emerges from the stock 'rice farming'. On the other hand, wheat, which grows on bare ground without irrigation, reveals the characteristics of the Western world, which have a strong personal and independent character.
How much have you tasted?
My parents say that they eat “white meat with meat soup” only a few times a year. It means that precious. Now that the world is better, rice consumption has decreased as food is overflowing. However, in the 1970s, when mass production of rice became possible, many wished to eat a single rice.
Hancheon at Deokje Palace, a restaurant specializing in Icheon rice
It is a difficult time for us to imagine that lunches and white kimbap with white rice are easily available at convenience stores.
Appetizers served when you order rice meal
Like this, rice is a staple food that we eat three times a day. What is so special about Icheon rice, which is said to have been won by King Surat, among the “rices” everyone eats every day? Icheon rice is growing despite the decrease in rice production nationwide. To taste his charm, headed to Chungchungdae.
Appetizers served when you order rice meal
Gap Street, Icheon Gyeongchung-daero
The road leading to Icheon by way of National Highway No. 3 is followed by restaurants that announce “Icheon Rice Restaurant”. Many famous rice shops, such as Deokje Palace, Icheon Rice Restaurant, and King's Rice Restaurant, are quite popular on weekends and weekdays. When ordered, Icheon rice, which was suggested to the king, is put in a stone-cooker and cooked. Other grains other than rice are white rice. Sometimes black beans enter the house. Like other nutritious rice, the jujube, chestnut, pine nuts, etc. are made only with rice, but the shiny rice itself is sweet and sweet. What side dishes would not be enough to greasy and delicious rice. Precious side dishes are added to this, so it's better to loosen the belt for a while.
How about the sweet rice you eat every day? The rice itself seems to taste the dishes. Asked the owner of Icheon's rice bakery, he chose "large daylight when the sun is abundant and the rice ripens" and "a land rich in nutrients mixed with clay and sand." It would mean that the rice has the optimal natural environment to grow. Since ancient times, this is why rice was chosen as a true beauty. What is important is that Icheon Rice's reputation is not just an old story.
Icheon rice street where Icheon rice specialty shops gather
The wage table Icheon rice, familiar to us, was the first rice in Korea to be attached with the wage table in the mid-1990s. The history of Icheon rice, which was on the top of the king's surat statue, is preserved as it is, and the revolutionary work was made to increase the reputation of Icheon rice.
“With the“ Mika ”boom, the leisure life of our people began in earnest. What's the most important thing to play around? Isn't the Geumgang mountain after dinner? As more and more people went to and from the Seoul metropolitan area, one or two restaurants started to be built on Icheon side. At first, we put our side dishes on rice, and as people gathered and restaurants increased, we now have a huge table. ”
Panoramic view of Deokje Palace built with Hanok style
Sweet or sweet! Greasy, white rice
Let's go try the Icheon rice meal. If you go to a restaurant specializing in Icheon rice, there are two or three set meals. There is a slight price difference, and the cheapest meals are prepared from 10,000 won to 30,000 won.
Icheon rice cooker Icheon stone-cooked rice
There is a slight price difference between restaurants, but no big difference. Appetizers such as porridge, jeon, salad, jelly, and chopped vegetables are similar. There are one or two differences in the main menu such as grilled eel, cutlet stew, gujeolpan, steamed ribs, soy crab, samhab, and smelt sashimi. Still, it is the same that Icheon Dolsot Rice is included in all price ranges.
Hansang
If you have a particular favorite side dish, you can also add a la carte to the cheapest meal. Most restaurants can be ordered from two or more people
Soy crab, one of the main menus
Dolsol rice is tasted according to taste. For those who want to enjoy the rice hot, you can enjoy it while you put it in a stone bowl and enjoy it.
LA ribs
It's only summer left to get hot. If you are tired of the rainy season and the typhoon that blows through the heat, why don't you go for a “bapsim”?
Noodles, the delicacy of stone rice
The energy of the tiger rises in a bowl of warm white rice. Whoever said that, Koreans are living with 'bapsim'.
One croaker rice in white rice
When you're done eating, stop by Sulbong Park, a 15-minute drive away. How about extinguishing while walking through Seolbong Park Lake? You may add cultural life at Woljeon Museum of Art.
Seolbong Park near Icheon Rice Street
Oh, if you know Icheon, the rice district, let's know the rice culture festival that takes place every year. This year, the festival will be held in Seolbong Park for five days from October 21 to 25. Not only rice, but also various attractions such as Namdang Playa and Madang Theater. For some reason, don't forget to eat a bowl of Icheon rice!
Icheon Museum of Art, Woljeon, Korea
